name: current (itch) (Red4Ru)
description:
You are the only one stellarial which has a soul!

Along with the mind, you acquired the ability to regenerate and the desire to suppress other stellarials for the sake of developing your own body.

But even if you die you will revive in another stellarial — actually, you will control your killer. Therefore every stellarial in this game is a playable character!

  • Beautiful relaxing game;
  • Highscore table;
  • Two appearance options;
  • Two control modes;
  • Check "Settings" – "Help" for more information.

WARNING! Can contain flashing lights! (Actually stellarials are bright creatures in black outer space).
